description: runtime: implement runtime usleep for openbsd

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=40f9c1636141 ***

runtime: implement runtime usleep for openbsd

R=golang-dev, mikioh.mikioh, hectorchu
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5173043

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
You will also need to set runtime.ncpu in osinit to enable parallel gc.

LGTM

On 2011/10/01 14:01:14, jsing wrote:

> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2011/10/01 14:59:29, hector wrote:
> You will also need to set runtime.ncpu in osinit to enable parallel gc.

Thanks - I'll get to this soon. Right now I'm just looking to unbreak the builds :)

subject: code review 5173043: runtime: implement runtime usleep for openbsd
